Description:
Detects a suspicious process creation as SYSTEM user (suspicious program or command line parameter)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), David ANDRE (additional keywords)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious SYSTEM User Process Creation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((((integrity_level = 'system' or integrity_level = 's-1-16-16384') and (username like '%authori%' or username like '%autori%')) and ((process_path like '%\calc.exe' or process_path like '%\cscript.exe' or process_path like '%\forfiles.exe' or process_path like '%\hh.exe' or process_path like '%\mshta.exe' or process_path like '%\ping.exe' or process_path like '%\wscript.exe') and (command like '% -nop %' or command like '% -w hidden %' or command like '% -decode %' or command like '% /decode %' or command like '% /urlcache %' or command like '% -urlcache %' or command like '% -e* jab%' or command like '% -e* suvyi%' or command like '% -e* sqbfafga%' or command like '% -e* awv4i%' or command like '% -e* iab%' or command like '% -e* paa%' or command like '% -e* aqblahga%' or command like '%vssadmin delete shadows%' or command like '%reg save hklm%' or command like '% -ma %' or command like '%microsoft\windows\currentversion\run%' or command like '%.downloadstring(%' or command like '%.downloadfile(%' or command like '% /ticket:%' or command like '%dpapi::%' or command like '%event::clear%' or command like '%event::drop%' or command like '%id::modify%' or command like '%kerberos::%' or command like '%lsadump::%' or command like '%misc::%' or command like '%privilege::%' or command like '%rpc::%' or command like '%sekurlsa::%' or command like '%sid::%' or command like '%token::%' or command like '%vault::cred%' or command like '%vault::list%' or command like '% p::d %' or command like '%;iex(%' or command like '%minidump%' or command like '%net user %'))) and  not ((process_path like '%\ping.exe' and parent_command_line like '%\dismfodinstall.cmd%') or parent_process_path like '%:\packages\plugins\microsoft.guestconfiguration.configurationforwindows\%' or ((parent_process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\java\%' or parent_process_path like '%:\program files\java\%') and parent_process_path like '%\bin\javaws.exe' and (process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\java\%' or process_path like '%:\program files\java\%') and process_path like '%\bin\jp2launcher.exe' and command like '% -ma %') or (command like '%ping%' and command like '%127.0.0.1%' and command like '% -n %')))
